<title level="1" right="Trait">[Infused](/Traits.aspx?ID=94)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 75 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

You created an [alchemical item](/equipment/alchemical-items) with the infused trait using your infused reagents, and it has a limited time before it becomes inert. Any nonpermanent effects from your infused alchemical items, with the exception of afflictions such as slow-acting [poisons](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), end when you make your daily preparations again.
